snippet: The program, which was first scheduled to begin last summer, will be limited for a week to people who buy annual memberships, and then opened to anyone.
abstract: New York City bike-share program, which was first scheduled to begin in 2012, will start on Memorial Day, May 27, but exclusively for people with annual memberships; it will open on June 2 for riders seeking daily or weekly passes.
lead_paragraph: The program, which was first scheduled to begin last summer, will be limited for a week to people who buy annual memberships, and then opened to anyone.

headline.seo: Bike-Share Program to Start May 27 in New York
headline.main: Delayed Bike-Share Program Is to Start on Memorial Day
headline.print_headline: Delayed Bike-Share Program Is to Start on Memorial Day
